name: the Digital Planning Poker Deck
description:
the Digital Planning Poker Deck is a tool that allows 4 people (currently) to estimate tasks / user stories / activities within Figma! ðŸŽ‰

The file contains a set of rules and a short description of how to play, for those who don't know planning poker, setup, and the play area.

It is quite simple to play. On page 1 you read the rules and type the names of each player in the allocated text fields. Then you head to page 2 where each player will have their own deck of cards to play from. The cards are swapped in the Instance-Panel.
